text: Smh I’ll throw away phone and all my electronics if it meant these HUMANS could be freed rn. It’s not worth it to have a phone if the people providing the products are slaving for it. This is sharecropping they are barely being paid and are treated like animals. 💔 https://t.co/HA2KTu5Gvw
